attributes.action: Foreign Aid Budget and Asylum Seekers
attributes.background: With the increasing number of asylum seekers, UK tax payers should not pay for both the foreign aid budget and support for asylum seekers. The foreign aid budget should be cut by the costs incurred by asylum seekers. This saving could be used to help vulnerable UK pensioners and deprived children.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107473

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
